short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to replace the phrase Donald Trump to Scrooge McDuck

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Trump McDuck is a fun extension that changes Donald Trump to Scrooge McDuck in your browser.

It also replaces the phrase Donald with Scrooge, and Trump with McDuck.
